CustomField.description: Starting Sentiment is a judgement call, based on scores and Comments: * High Five - All Scores are high, and the customer has provided positive comments * Positive - All Scores are high, but customer has not provided any comments * Unclear - Score are mid-range and or the scores do not match customer's comments * Low confidence - The Scores are low and the comment is negative
CustomField.inlineHelpText: From Scores and Comments: High Five-All Scores are high, positive comments Positive-All Scores are high, no comments Unclear-Middle Scores,or mixed comments Opportunity-Comments indicate issue, some low scores Low Confidence-Neg comment, Low scores
CustomField.label: Starting Sentiment
